amendment.description: To direct the Secretary of Energy to submit to Congress a report on the use of the Northeast Home Heating Oil Reserve.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1780 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1780 proposed by Senator Burns for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S11816-11819; text: CR S11819) To direct the Secretary of Energy to submit to Congress a report on the use of the Northeast Home Heating Oil Reserve.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1780 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1780 proposed by Senator Burns for Senator Snowe.
